fields.description: A tree that displays a rough order of how you should learn Python topics and links to documentation on what each topic represents.
fields.data: {"link": "http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?PythonPhilosophy", "name": "Philosophy of Python", "contents": [{"link": "http://www.penzilla.net/tutorials/python/functions/", "name": "Functions", "contents": [{"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/controlflow.html#lambda-forms", "name": "Lambda Functions"}, {"link": "http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=240808", "name": "Decorators"}, {"link": "http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Python_Programming/Flow_control#Loops", "name": "Iteration (for, while)"}, {"link": "http://beastie.cs.ua.edu/cs150/book/book_14.html", "name": "Recursion"}]}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/classes.html", "name": "Objects & Classes", "contents": [{"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/modules.html", "name": "Modules & Namespaces", "contents": [{"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/classes.html#python-scopes-and-namespaces", "name": "Variable Scope"}]}, {"link": "http://stackoverflow.com/questions/100003/what-is-a-metaclass-in-python", "name": "Metaclasses"}]}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/errors.html", "name": "Exception Handling", "contents": [{"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/errors.html#handling-exceptions", "name": "try-except-else Statements"}]}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/datastructures.html", "name": "Built-in Data Structures", "contents": [{"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/datastructures.html#dictionaries", "name": "Dictionaries"}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/library/string.html", "name": "Strings"}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/introduction.html#lists", "name": "Lists", "contents": [{"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/datastructures.html#list-comprehensions", "name": "List Comprehensions"}]}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/tutorial/datastructures.html#tuples-and-sequences", "name": "Tuples"}]}, {"link": "http://www.python.org/dev/peps/", "name": "PEPs", "contents": [{"link": "http://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0008/", "name": "PEP8 Style Guide", "contents": [{"link": "http://www.logilab.org/857/", "name": "Pylint"}, {"link": "http://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0257/", "name": "Documentation Strings"}, {"link": "http://docs.python.org/release/2.5.1/ref/indentation.html", "name": "Indentation"}]}]}]}
fields.name: Python Topics Tree
